pr_title: [samsungtv] Documentation. Add new tested TV model and more examples

timeline.bodyText: Please use a new line for each sentence
timeline.author: J-N-K
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,8 +41,9 @@ Additionally, a refresh interval can be configured in milliseconds to specify ho
 E.g.
 
 ```
-Thing samsungtv:tv:livingroom [ hostName="192.168.1.10", port=55000, refreshInterval=1000 ]
+Thing samsungtv:tv:livingroom [ hostName="192.168.1.10", port=55000, macAddress="78:bd:bc:9f:12:34", refreshInterval=1000 ]
 ```
+Different ports are used in different models. It may be 8001 or 8002. Try to scan for new Things in Paper UI to find TV easily.

timeline.message:
Add new tested TV model and more examples

Signed-off-by: Kiryl Bahdanau <kirbah@gmail.com>

Add new tested TV model and more examples
